meanings.definition: Clothing worn in a town or city.
meanings.sent1: She bought new townwear for her trip to the city.
meanings.sent2: The store had a great selection of townwear for urban living.
meanings.sent3: His bright townwear stood out among the crowd of dull outfits.
meanings.sent4: Her townwear was like a colorful painting in the gray cityscape.
meanings.sent5: The townwear she chose was both stylish and comfortable for walking around town.

meanings.definition: To wear clothing appropriate for a town or city setting.
meanings.sent1: She decided to townwear her best outfit for the evening out.
meanings.sent2: People usually townwear more formal clothes when going to the theater.
meanings.sent3: He promised to townwear his suit, but showed up in casual attire instead.
meanings.sent4: She always townwears her favorite dress when visiting the city.
meanings.sent5: The tourists were townwearing shorts and t-shirts, while the locals wore more sophisticated attire.
